name: easyJet
goal:
We are Europe's leading airline, operating on over 800 routes across more than 30 countries with our fleet of over 250 Airbus aircraft. We employ over 10,000 people including 2,000 pilots and 4,500+ cabin crew. Last year we flew over 73 million passengers.

We have strong positions in key markets: No. 1 at London Gatwick, London Luton, London Southend, Bristol, Edinburgh, Milan Malpensa, Naples, Venice, Nice, Basel and Geneva; No. 2 at London Stansted, Paris Orly, Paris Charles De Gaulle, Lisbon, Lyon, and Amsterdam with over 300 million people within a one hour drive of an easyJet airport.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: EU aviation policy and related issues
